snippet.title: Gabriel Knight: Sins of the Fathers 20th Anniversary Edition Gamescom 14 Trailer
snippet.description:
Available Now on:
Phoenix Online Store: http://store.postudios.com/products/gabriel-knight-sins-of-the-fathers-20th-anniversary-edition
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/262000/
GOG: http://www.gog.com/game/gabriel_knight_sins_of_the_fathers_20th_anniversary_edition


Gabriel Knight: Sins of the Fathers ®, Jane Jensen's classic adventure game featuring a series of voodoo murders, New Orleans, forbidden romance, and the most charming womanizer you ever met, is back. Winner of numerous industry awards when it appeared in 1993, this 20th anniversary update will be better than ever with high res graphics, an all new remastered soundtrack, behind-the-scenes goodies, and the great gameplay and story of the original.

See more at: 
http://www.gabrielknight20th.com/
http://www.postudios.com/company/

Follow us on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PhoenixOnlineStudios
Twitter: https://twitter.com/POStudios
Tumblr: http://postudios.tumblr.com/
